content: sunday funday by wendee shulsen designed to showcase the softness of our new yarn base cashual dk we present sunday funday this breezy neck scarf combines an easy-to-remember lace sequence with basic stockinette for structure materials yarn hazel knits cashual dk 80% fully charted on ravelry / download version superwash merino 10% cashmere color shown is jacquard 10% nylon 270 yards/125 g 1 skein pattern support hello@hazelknits com tech edited by birdbath handmade needle us 6 4 0 mm www birdbathhandmade com gauge 5 sts = 1 in pattern after blocking supplies tapestry needle for weaving in ends blocking materials abbreviations set up first 20 row are set up row k knit p purl cast on 6 stitches sl slip stitches from right to left you may follow written instructions or use charts needle row 1 - 4 knit 3 sl 3 sts pwise wyf sl sts pwise wyf slip stitches row 5 k3 m1p sl 3 sts pwise wyf - 7 sts purl-wise with yarn in front row 6 k4 sl 3 sts pwise wyf m1k make one knit stitch bar row 7 k3 p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf increase row 8 k4 sl 3 sts pwise wyf m1p make one purl stitch bar row 9 k3 m1k p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf - 8 sts increase row 10 - 12 k4 p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf row 13 k3 m1k k1 p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf - 9 sts yo yarn over row 14 k4 p2 sl 3 sts pwise wyf k2tog knit two stitches together row 15 k5 p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf ssk slip slip knit row 16 k4 p2 sl 3 sts pwise wyf row 17 k3 m1k k2 p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf - 10 sts sl1 k1 psso slip 1 stitch knit the row 18 k4 p3 sl 3 sts pwise wyf next stitch slip the slipped stitch row 19 k6 p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf over the stitch just knitted row 20 k4 p3 sl 3 sts pwise wyf text p2tog purl two stitches together pg 1 sunday funday by wendee shulsen www hazelknits com increases begin increases and lace increases occur every 8th row on right side all even numbered row in each 8-row set are the same stitch patterns consist of 5 stitches and will be grouped into parenthesis for ease of reading once they are formed row 21 k3 m1p k1 yo k2tog p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf - 11 sts on the needle row 22 24 26 28 k4 p3 k1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf row 23 k3 p1 ssk yo k1 p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf row 25 k3 p1 k1 yo k2tog p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf row 27 repeat row 23 row 29 k3 m1p p1 k1 yo k2tog p1 sl 3 sts pwise wyf - 12 sts on the needle row 30 32 34 36 k4 p3 k2 sl 3 sts pwise wyf
